Posts.Content: I am from Columbus and went to Partin at Johns Hopkins. I would have gone to Dr. Klien at the Cleveland Clinic if I could not have gotten into to Partin. Stay away from Ohio State Uni. They are bafoons.
Posts.Title: Finding the Best Surgeon in Ohio
